title: Jhin Music
body: It won't show it on this account as I had an account before that was perma'd for toxicity and rightfully so, but I was a Jhin and Kindred main for a long time and the only reason I started playing them in the first place was because of the music and backstory. You guys on the music as well as the backstory and character design for Jhin and Kindred are awesome.

replies.body: Sorry about your old account :(, funny to see your new summoner name tho! And appreciate the love for the music, Ed did a great job on Jhin its def one of my favs as well. My all time fav is the Urf login music though. Nothing can top that imo

> [{quoted}](name=Bazerka,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=X8BfXl1K,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-12T22:08:26.062+0000)
>
> Sorry about your old account :(, funny to see your new summoner name tho! And appreciate the love for the music, Ed did a great job on Jhin its def one of my favs as well. My all time fav is the Urf login music though. Nothing can top that imo

*cough* *cough* kindred login screen *cough* *cough*
Yeah I got project Jhin skin on new account and knew it was a sign haha
agreed. you and i are exactly alike. in the same boat as you. jhin main perma banned. now i've remade a new account with more jhin main experience.
I only just recently listened to Kindred's log-in theme because I wanted to know if Lamb was singing it (like some champs do).  Liked it way more than I expected :)
